# Dockerfile to build a Docker image with the Swift binaries and its dependencies.

FROM norionomura/sourcekit:302

# Set environment variables for image
ENV HOME /root
ENV WORK_DIR /root

# Set WORKDIR
WORKDIR ${WORK_DIR}

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install build-essential && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install ZMQ
RUN cd /tmp/ \
    && curl -f -L -O https://github.com/zeromq/zeromq4-1/releases/download/v4.1.4/zeromq-4.1.4.tar.gz \
    && tar xf /tmp/zeromq-4.1.4.tar.gz \
    && cd /tmp/zeromq-4.1.4 \
    && ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" --without-libsodium \
    && make \
    && make install && rm /tmp/zeromq-4.1.4.tar.gz

RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install openssl libssl-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

#Install Pip3
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip

# Install Jupyter
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir jupyter

COPY . ${WORK_DIR}/iSwift
WORKDIR ${WORK_DIR}/iSwift

RUN swift package update
RUN swift build
RUN jupyter kernelspec install iSwiftKernel

EXPOSE 8888

RUN mkdir notebooks

CMD ["jupyter", "notebook", "--port=8888", "--no-browser", "--NotebookApp.token=", "--ip=0.0.0.0", "--notebook-dir=notebooks"]
